title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. VII, pt. 187 - Credit Unemployment Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. VII, pt. 187 - Credit Unemployment Insurance

State Regulations
§ 187.1 - Definitions
§ 187.2 - Filing and approval of forms and premium rates
§ 187.3 - Forms of credit unemployment insurance
§ 187.4 - Provisions of policies and certificates of insurance, disclosure to debtors
§ 187.5 - Amount and term of credit unemployment insurance
§ 187.6 - Premiums and identifiable charges
§ 187.7 - Premium refunds
§ 187.8 - Commissions and fees or other allowances
§ 187.9 - Dividends, retrospective rate credits, and retrospective premiums
§ 187.10 - Payment of claims
§ 187.11 - Experience statistics
§ 187.12 - Open-end loans and charge plans
§ 187.13 - Prohibited practices
§ 187.14 - Severability provision

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. VII, pt. 187

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 1113, 3201, 3436, 4216, 4224

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
